TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RichTextBoxStreamType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the types of input and output streams used to load and save data in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
## Examples The following example saves the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> into an ASCII text file. The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog> class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. The example uses this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard Rich Text Format. This example assumes that the code is placed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class that has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1`.
[!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType PlainText = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A plain text stream that includes spaces in places of Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType RichNoOleObjs = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A Rich Text Format (RTF) stream with spaces in place of OLE objects. This value is only valid for use with the method of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType RichText = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType TextTextOleObjs = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A plain text stream with a textual representation of OLE objects. This value is only valid for use with the method of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType UnicodePlainText = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A text stream that contains spaces in place of Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) objects. The text is encoded in Unicode.
